requirement_text: Data governance and quality for training, validation and testing data
control_assurance: Dataset quality computed; coverage/missingness thresholds enforced; selection rates and metrics persisted for auditability.

requirement_text: Evaluate disparate impact and record selection disparities by protected class
control_assurance: AIR (disparate impact ratio) computed with deterministic CIs (Wilson/delta methods) in metrics_uncertainty.json; bootstrap/BCa in metrics_long.csv is optional annex/back-compat; intake generated under Gate-WP.
notes: Gate-WP evidence bundle provides hashes for reproducibility.
